sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO boss_tb_park_record ( PARK_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, PARK_CARD_ID, CAR_NO, STATE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #parkId#, STR_TO_DATE(#startTime#, '%Y-%m-%d %T'), STR_TO_DATE(#endTime#, '%Y-%m-%d %T'), #parkCardId#, #carNo#, 'U', NOW(), NOW(), #modifyUser# )
